item.title: HackTheBox - Markup Writeup
item.author: SH∆FIQ ∆IM∆N
item.description: Enumeration Top 1000 ports scan 1 nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap/initial 10.10.10.49 the result nmap initial scan All ports scan 1 nmap -sC -sV -p- -oN nmap/all_ports 10.10.10.49 the result nmap allports scan Open Ports Well, both the Nmap scan result are the same port 22/SSH port 80/HTTP port 443/HTTPs Webpage Let’s take a look at the webpage HTTP login webpage Look’s like just a regular login page. We can try to login with credentials we’ve found from the previous box called Included Let’s try it home webpage Success Now, time to enumerate/play around with this page.
